name: Monomer
tagline: A Monomer is Polymer UI library.
body:
### What is the Monomer? 
Monomer is a Polymer library that enables web applications to do more with data. The components of Monomer are designed so that they can be used independently or together. It is designed to be small, fast and easy to use.

[![Build Status](https://drone.io/github.com/akserg/monomer/status.png)](https://drone.io/github.com/akserg/monomer/latest)

##Fork the Monomer

If you'd like to contribute back to the core, you can fork this repository and send a pull request to me, when it is ready.

If you are new to Git or GitHub, please read this [guide](https://help.github.com/) first.
